plot: Jeremy, Richard and James take a close look at vans, testing the Renault Master, Ford Transit and Volkswagen T30 TDI 174 Sportline when they become roadies for The Who and take their equipment to their next concert venue, and also buying a Ford Transit, LDV Convoy and Suzuki Supercarry for £1000 and testing them for things including speed, tailgating and "getaway-car" ability. Richard heads to the track to drive the Noble M15. Formula 1 driver Jenson Button is the Star In A Reasonably Priced Car.—Allister Coots
